title: Strategies for Enhancing Self-Efficacy and Improving Language Achievement in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based short-term intensive courses in digitally equipped environments.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize tools to measure their self-efficacy in online learning environments
Learners design personalized learning paths and perform self-directed learning activities at least three times weekly
Learners produce project deliverables incorporating over 50 target language expressions in blended learning environments
Learners derive at least two academic achievement improvement strategies through peer feedback systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
